publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2396 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau:Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 2 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the Community Reparation Orders (Requirements for Consultation and Prescribed Activities) ( Scotland) Regulations 2005 (SSI 2005/18).
